mapper.select: SELECT player_phone,shop,shop_id,status,create_time FROM tbl_order WHERE shop_id= #{shopId} AND player_phone = #{buyerPhone} AND status IN (30,40,60,90,100,110) ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
SELECT id,shop,type,status,create_time FROM tbl_order WHERE player_phone = #{buyerPhone} AND status IN (0,10,20,60) AND type IN (0,1,2,4)
SELECT id,shop,type,status,create_time FROM tbl_order WHERE player_phone = #{buyerPhone} AND status IN (0,10) AND type = 3 AND to_days(create_time) = to_days(now())
SELECT id,shop,type,status,create_time FROM tbl_order WHERE player_phone = #{buyerPhone} AND status IN (0,10,20,60) AND type = 3 AND to_days(now()) - to_days(create_time) <= 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_order WHERE player_phone = #{buyerPhone} AND status IN (30,40,60,90,100,110) AND to_days(create_time) = to_days(now())
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_order WHERE player_phone = #{buyerPhone} AND status IN (30,40,60,90,100,110) AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= create_time
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_order WHERE player_phone = #{buyerPhone} AND status IN (30,40,60,90,100,110) AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= create_time
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_order WHERE task_order_id = #{taskOrderId} AND status IN (0,10,20)
